mapper.select:
select ORG_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_CNAME, ORG_ENAME, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, TELEPHONE, FAX, STATUS, PARENT_ID, DEPARTH, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USERID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USERID, REMARK, LINK_MAN_NAME, LINK_MAN_DEPT, LINK_MAN_POS, LINK_MAN_TEL, LINK_MAN_FAX, LINK_MAN_EMAIL, DELETED_TIME, DELETED_USERID, FROM_SYSTEM, IS_LINKAGE from CW_GE_ORGANIZATION where 1 = 1
and PARENT_ID is null
and PARENT_ID = #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and STATUS = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and STATUS in (0, 1)
and FAX like CONCAT('%', #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and ZIP_CODE like CONCAT('%', #{zipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and ORG_CODE like CONCAT('%', #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and ORG_CNAME like CONCAT('%', #{orgCname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and ORG_ENAME like CONCAT('%', #{orgEname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and TELEPHONE like CONCAT('%', #{telephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and ADDRESS like CONCAT('%', #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and LINK_MAN_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{linkManName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and LINK_MAN_DEPT like CONCAT('%', #{linkManDept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and LINK_MAN_POS like CONCAT('%', #{linkManPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and LINK_MAN_TEL like CONCAT('%', #{linkManTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and LINK_MAN_FAX like CONCAT('%', #{linkManFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and LINK_MAN_EMAIL like CONCAT('%', #{linkManEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and IS_LINKAGE = #{isLinkage, jdbcType=SMALLINT}
order by CREATED_TIME desc

select main.ORG_ID, main.ORG_CODE, main.ORG_CNAME, main.ORG_ENAME, main.ADDRESS, main.ZIP_CODE, main.TELEPHONE, main.FAX, main.STATUS, main.PARENT_ID, main.DEPARTH, main.CREATE_TIME, main.CREATE_USER_ID, main.UPDATE_TIME, main.UPDATE_USER_ID, main.REMARK, main.LINK_MAN_NAME, main.LINK_MAN_DEPT, main.LINK_MAN_POS, main.LINK_MAN_TEL, main.LINK_MAN_FAX, main.LINK_MAN_EMAIL, main.DELETE_TIME, main.DELETE_USER_ID, main.FROM_SYSTEM, main.IS_LINKAGE, u.LOGIN_NAME AS createUserName from CW_GE_ORGANIZATION main left join CW_GE_USER u on main.CREATE_USER_ID = u.USER_ID where 1 = 1
and main.ORG_ID = #{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and main.STATUS = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and main.STATUS in (0, 1)
and main.PARENT_ID is null
and main.PARENT_ID = #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CONCAT('|',main.DEPARTH, '|') like CONCAT('%|', #{departh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '|%')
and main.FAX like CONCAT('%', #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.ZIP_CODE like CONCAT('%', #{zipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.ORG_CODE like CONCAT('%', #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.ORG_CNAME like CONCAT('%', #{orgCname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.ORG_ENAME like CONCAT('%', #{orgEname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.TELEPHONE like CONCAT('%', #{telephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.ADDRESS like CONCAT('%', #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.LINK_MAN_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{linkManName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.LINK_MAN_DEPT like CONCAT('%', #{linkManDept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.LINK_MAN_POS like CONCAT('%', #{linkManPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.LINK_MAN_TEL like CONCAT('%', #{linkManTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.LINK_MAN_FAX like CONCAT('%', #{linkManFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.LINK_MAN_EMAIL like CONCAT('%', #{linkManEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and main.UPDATE_TIME >= #{updateTime, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and main.IS_LINKAGE = #{isLinkage, jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.insert: insert into CW_GE_ORGANIZATION(ORG_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_CNAME, ORG_ENAME, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, TELEPHONE, FAX, STATUS, PARENT_ID, DEPARTH, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USERID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USERID, REMARK, LINK_MAN_NAME, LINK_MAN_DEPT, LINK_MAN_POS, LINK_MAN_TEL, LINK_MAN_FAX, LINK_MAN_EMAIL, DELETED_TIME, DELETED_USERID, FROM_SYSTEM, IS_LINKAGE) values(#{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgEname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkManName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkManDept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkManPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkManTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkManFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkManEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleteUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromSystem, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLinkage, jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update CW_GE_ORGANIZATION set ORG_CODE = #{orgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CNAME = #{orgCname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ENAME = #{orgEname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTH = #{departh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updateTime, jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATED_USERID = #{updateUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN_NAME = #{linkManName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN_DEPT = #{linkManDept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN_POS = #{linkManPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN_TEL = #{linkManTel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN_FAX = #{linkManFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN_EMAIL = #{linkManEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_SYSTEM = #{fromSystem, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_LINKAGE = #{isLinkage, jdbcType=SMALLINT} where ORG_ID = #{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ORG_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_CNAME, ORG_ENAME, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, TELEPHONE, FAX, STATUS, PARENT_ID, DEPARTH, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USERID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USERID, REMARK, LINK_MAN_NAME, LINK_MAN_DEPT, LINK_MAN_POS, LINK_MAN_TEL, LINK_MAN_FAX, LINK_MAN_EMAIL, DELETED_TIME, DELETED_USERID, FROM_SYSTEM, IS_LINKAGE FROM CW_GE_ORGANIZATION WHERE STATUS =1 AND (PARENT_ID IS NULL OR PARENT_ID ='')
mapper.insert:
insert into cw_ge_organization (ORG_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_CNAME, ORG_ENAME, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, TELEPHONE, FAX, STATUS, PARENT_ID, LINK_MAN_NAME, LINK_MAN_DEPT, LINK_MAN_POS, LINK_MAN_TEL, LINK_MAN_FAX, LINK_MAN_EMAIL, FROM_SYSTEM, IS_LINKAGE, REMARK, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_USERID, UPDATED_TIME, UPDATED_USERID, DELETED_TIME, DELETED_USERID, DEPARTH) values
(#{organizationExpList.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.orgCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.orgEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{organizationExpList.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.linkManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.linkManDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.linkManPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.linkManTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.linkManFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.linkManEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.fromSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.isLinkage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{organizationExpList.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.createTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{organizationExpList.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.updateTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{organizationExpList.updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.deleteTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{organizationExpList.deleteUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationExpList.departh,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
